@graph.name: WPS Office Official Website
@graph.description: Download WPS Office for free - the best alternative to Microsoft Office. Compatible with Word, Excel, PowerPoint. Available for Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS.

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, WPS Office offers a completely free personal version with all core features including word processing, spreadsheets, presentations, and PDF editing. Premium features are available for advanced users, but the free version is fully functional for most users.

mainEntity.name: Is WPS Office compatible with Microsoft Office?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, WPS Office is fully compatible with Microsoft Office formats including DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, and PPTX. You can open, edit, and save files in Microsoft Office formats without any compatibility issues.

mainEntity.name: What platforms does WPS Office support?

acceptedAnswer.text: WPS Office is available for Windows (Windows 11, 10, 8, 7), macOS (including Apple Silicon M1/M2), Linux (Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora), Android smartphones and tablets, and iOS devices (iPhone and iPad). All your documents sync seamlessly across devices.

mainEntity.name: How is WPS Office different from Microsoft Office?

acceptedAnswer.text: WPS Office is a free alternative to Microsoft Office with similar functionality. Key differences: WPS Office is completely free for personal use, has a smaller installation size (210MB vs 3GB+), includes AI writing assistant features, and offers cloud storage integration. It's compatible with all Microsoft Office file formats.

Yes, WPS Office works fully offline. You can create, edit, and save documents without an internet connection. Internet is only required for downloading the software, cloud sync features, and accessing online templates.

mainEntity.name: Can I use WPS Office for business or commercial purposes?

acceptedAnswer.text: The free personal version of WPS Office is for individual non-commercial use. For business, educational institutions, or commercial use, WPS Office offers professional licenses with additional features like advanced collaboration tools, priority support, and enterprise management capabilities.

mainEntity.name: How do I download WPS Office?

acceptedAnswer.text: Visit https://www.wpsio.com/download and select your platform (Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, or iOS). Click the download button, run the installer, and follow the on-screen instructions. The installation takes only a few minutes.

mainEntity.name: Does WPS Office have AI features?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, WPS Office includes AI-powered features such as intelligent writing assistance, automatic formatting, data analysis suggestions, and smart templates. These AI features help improve productivity and document quality.

mainEntity.name: What languages does WPS Office support?

acceptedAnswer.text: WPS Office supports multiple languages including English, Simplified Chinese (简体中文), Traditional Chinese (繁體中文), Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Korean, and many others. You can easily switch between languages in the settings.

mainEntity.name: Is WPS Office safe and secure?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, WPS Office is safe to download and use. The software includes security features like password protection for documents, encrypted cloud storage, and regular security updates. It's trusted by millions of users worldwide and doesn't contain malware or adware.
